page.title: 13 INDUSTRIAL ESTATES
page.content: On the edge of the city,estates are springing up.There are 3 industrial estates which are named{Baldovie {Trading Estate,Baluniefield Trading {Estate}and{West Pitkerro Industrial {Estate.}All of these are new estates and on most of them factories are still being built.Some of the factories are being built for specific companies like Top Hat Frozen Food Store but others are just basic factories shells.Harry Lawson haulage company is a large company using tankers,lorries of all sizes and small vans for transporting goods.There is also a caravan showroom with offices and an Alpine lemonade store. Previously,{Baluniefield}estate was wasteground and{West Pitkerro}estate was farmland.
